definitions.definition: a doctor, especially one who is a specialist in general medicine and not surgery

examples.text: Dr Dennett is a practicing family physician in Atlanta.
Please consult your physician before beginning any new exercise program.
He became the President's personal physician.
He was physician to George Washington.
physician to the Duke of Albemarle

wordOrigin: Middle English: from Old French fisicien, based on Latin physica ‘things relating to nature’, from Greek phusikē (epistēmē) ‘(knowledge) of nature’.
